334330.name: FaceRig Team Fortress 2 Avatars DLC
334330.description:
FaceRig is now retired, new customers can check out


Team Fortress 2 Free Avatars DLC contains Medic, Sniper, Heavy, Scout, Spy, Demoman, Soldier, Pyro and Miss Pauling. The DLC requires the base application FaceRig on Steam in order to run.

Team Fortress assets are © Valve. Use of Team Fortress assets is governed by the Steam Subscriber Agreement.
334330.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 俄语, 繁体中文
